permissions: Admin users can update any incident subscription. Non-admin users can update subscriptions where they are the user or where they are a practical member of the scoped organization; if an incident is scoped, membership in the incident organizations also permits update.
validation_notes: Requires the incident subscription ID argument. At least one field must be updated. --incident-type and --incident-id must be provided together. Only one of --broker, --customer, or --material-supplier may be specified. If an incident scope is provided, organization scope and kind must be omitted. User must be contactable when incident-scoped, must have the incident in scope, and cannot create duplicate scopes. Organization type must be Broker, Customer, or MaterialSupplier when organization is set.

flags.name: --kind
flags.validation: Must be omitted when incident scope is provided.

flags.name: --broker
flags.validation: Only one of --broker, --customer, or --material-supplier may be specified.

flags.name: --customer
flags.validation: Only one of --broker, --customer, or --material-supplier may be specified.

flags.name: --material-supplier
flags.validation: Only one of --broker, --customer, or --material-supplier may be specified.
